infos.value: Does something concern you about that necklace?
I almost forgot I still have it. I regret not giving it back.
You do? Why is that?
I can't help but worry that if anything were to happen to Machérie...
Then maybe this necklace would protect her...
Hahahaha...
Wh-what're you laughing at!?
Lady Machérie entrusted it to you out of concern for your welfare.
My welfare...?
She is terribly concerned for you, Lord Mont. Your kind heart...
Father said something similar...
First Minwu who joined our company, and then Glaciela of Wezette...
It seems that you have a way with the ladies, Lord Mont.
Th-that's not true at all!
"I want you to remember me whenever you look upon this necklace..."
I daresay that's what Lady Machérie was also thinking.
Even without the necklace, I could never forget her. Ever.
What's the matter?
Something just occurred to me about that villager, Minwu.
I get the uncanny feeling that we have met somewhere before...
Where, though...?
